response.overview: A harmless game of "Truth or Dare" among friends turns deadly when someone—or something—begins to punish those who tell a lie—or refuse the dare.
response.tagline: First you play the game, then the game plays you.
response.title: Truth or Dare

titles.title: O Jogo do Desafio: Versão Estendida do Diretor

results.name: “I Don’t Want To Play Anymore” - Extended Preview
